CWEs: CWE-74: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection')
description: The function does not properly validate input and can be exploited to modify the prototype of Object, causing the addition or modification of an existing property that will exist on all objects. This can lead to several issues like denial of service (DoS), Remote Code Execution (RCE), or even lead to property injection.
